alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Vilas County through 1000 PM CDT... At 911 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winchester around 925 PM CDT. Rice Creek Natural Area around 930 PM CDT. Boulder Junction and Border Lakes Natural Area around 935 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Van Vliet Hemlocks Natural Area, Manitowish Waters, Dunn Lake Natural Area, Presque Isle and High Lake Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
